nodes.id: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

zh-cn: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想
新时代中国特色社会主义思想
en: Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的指导思想之一，是继毛泽东思想、邓小平理论之后第三个以领导人名字命名的中共指导思想。
description.en: One of the guiding ideologies of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and the third to be named after a leader, following Mao Zedong Thought and Deng Xiaoping Theory.

en: Xi Jinping

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席，是习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的主要创立者。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He is the main founder of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era.

en: Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会
en: 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 在此次大会上，“习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想”被写入《中国共产党章程》。
description.en: At this congress, "Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era" was written into the Constitution of the Communist Party of China.

en: Constitution of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的根本法规。
description.en: The fundamental regulations of the Communist Party of China.

en: Mao Zedong Thought

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的指导思想之一，以毛泽东命名。
description.en: One of the guiding ideologies of the Communist Party of China, named after Mao Zedong.

en: Deng Xiaoping Theory

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的指导思想之一，以邓小平命名。
description.en: One of the guiding ideologies of the Communist Party of China, named after Deng Xiaoping.

en: Jiang Zemin

description.zh-cn: 前中国共产党中央委员会总书记，习近平的前两任之一。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, one of Xi Jinping's two predecessors.

en: Hu Jintao

description.zh-cn: 前中国共产党中央委员会总书记，习近平的前任。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, Xi Jinping's predecessor.

en: Great Rejuvenation of the Chinese Nation

description.zh-cn: 习近平提出的政治口号，习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想被视为实现此目标的行动指南。
description.en: A political slogan proposed by Xi Jinping. Xi Jinping Thought is regarded as the action guide for achieving this goal.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会
en: 13th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 13th term of the highest state authority in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会一次会议

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会一次会议
en: First Session of the 13th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 此次会议通过了《中华人民共和国宪法修正案（2018年）》，将习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想写入宪法。
description.en: This session passed the "Amendment to the Constitution of the People's Republic of China (2018)," writing Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era into the constitution.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)
中华人民共和国宪法修正案（2018年）
en: Amendment to the Constitution of the People's Republic of China (2018)

description.zh-cn: 该修正案将习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想写入了《中华人民共和国宪法》。
description.en: This amendment wrote Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era into the Constitution of the People's Republic of China.

en: Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的根本法。
description.en: The fundamental law of the People's Republic of China.

en: Scientific Outlook on Development

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的指导思想之一，由胡锦涛政府提出。
description.en: One of the guiding ideologies of the Communist Party of China, proposed by the Hu Jintao administration.

en: Cai Qi

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常委、中央书记处书记。曾任中共北京市委书记。
description.en: Member of the Politburo Standing Committee and First Secretary of the Secretariat of the Communist Party of China. Former Secretary of the Beijing Municipal Committee of the CPC.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leadership body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想研究中心（院）

zh-cn: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想研究中心（院）
en: Research Center (Institute) for Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era

description.zh-cn: 经中共中央批准成立的，专门研究习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的学术机构。
description.en: An academic institution approved by the CPC Central Committee for the specialized study of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era.

en: Propaganda Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管意识形态方面工作的综合职能部门。
description.en: A functional department of the CPC Central Committee responsible for ideology.

nodes.id: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想学习纲要

zh-cn: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想学习纲要
en: Outline for the Study of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era

description.zh-cn: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的官方辅助读物。
description.en: An official supplementary reader for Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era.

en: National Textbook Committee

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责指导和管理全国教材工作的机构。
description.en: An organization in the People's Republic of China responsible for guiding and managing national textbook work.

en: Politburo of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的领导机构之一。
description.en: One of the leadership bodies of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 学习贯彻习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想主题教育

zh-cn: 学习贯彻习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想主题教育
en: Themed education campaign on studying and implementing Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era

description.zh-cn: 由中共中央政治局决定在中国共产党全党范围内开展的思想教育运动。
description.en: An ideological education campaign launched by the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee throughout the entire Communist Party of China.

en: Selected Works of Xi Jinping

description.zh-cn: 收录习近平重要著作的文集，被定为师生理论学习教材。
description.en: A collection of Xi Jinping's important works, designated as theoretical study material for teachers and students.

en: Education Bureau (Hong Kong)

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府负责教育事务的部门。
description.en: The department responsible for educational affairs in the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

en: Ren Zhenhe

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任甘肃省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, serving as the Governor of Gansu Province.

en: Willy Wo-Lap Lam

description.zh-cn: 香港记者、学者，香港中文大学历史系兼任教授。
description.en: A Hong Kong journalist and scholar, adjunct professor in the History Department of the Chinese University of Hong Kong.

en: The Chinese University of Hong Kong

description.zh-cn: 位于香港的研究型大学。
description.en: A research university in Hong Kong.

en: Chen Daoyin

description.zh-cn: 学者，上海政法学院国际事务与公共管理学院副教授。
description.en: A scholar, associate professor at the School of International Affairs and Public Administration, Shanghai University of Political Science and Law.

en: Shanghai University of Political Science and Law

description.zh-cn: 位于上海市的高等院校。
description.en: An institution of higher education located in Shanghai.

en: Xi Jinping Thought on the Rule of Law

description.zh-cn: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想在法治领域的具体体现。
description.en: The specific embodiment of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era in the field of the rule of law.

en: Xi Jinping Thought on Diplomacy

description.zh-cn: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想在外交领域的具体体现。
description.en: The specific embodiment of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era in the field of diplomacy.

en: Xi Jinping Thought on Strengthening the Military

description.zh-cn: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想在军事领域的具体体现。
description.en: The specific embodiment of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era in the military field.

en: Xi Jinping Thought on Economy

description.zh-cn: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想在经济领域的具体体现。
description.en: The specific embodiment of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era in the economic field.

en: Xi Jinping Thought on Ecological Civilization

description.zh-cn: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想在生态文明建设领域的具体体现。
description.en: The specific embodiment of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era in the field of ecological civilization.

en: Xi Jinping Thought on Culture

description.zh-cn: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想在文化领域的具体体现。
description.en: The specific embodiment of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era in the cultural field.

relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 习近平是习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的主要创立者。
description.en: Xi Jinping is the main founder of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会
relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 中共十九大通过关于《中国共产党章程（修正案）》的决议，将习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想写入党章，确立为党的指导思想。
description.en: The 19th National Congress of the CPC passed a resolution on the "Constitution of the Communist Party of China (Amendment)," writing Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era into the Party Constitution and establishing it as the Party's guiding ideology.

relationships.source: 第十三届全国人民代表大会一次会议
relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 第十三届全国人大一次会议通过《中华人民共和国宪法修正案（2018年）》，将习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想写入国家宪法。
description.en: The First Session of the 13th National People's Congress passed the "Amendment to the Constitution of the People's Republic of China (2018)," writing Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era into the national constitution.

relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想继承和发展了毛泽东思想。
description.en: Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era inherits and develops Mao Zedong Thought.

relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想继承和发展了邓小平理论。
description.en: Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era inherits and develops Deng Xiaoping Theory.

relationships.source: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想
relationships.target: 习近平

description.zh-cn: 该思想成为以领导人名字命名的中共指导思想，意味着习近平在意识形态上的绝对权威得以树立，其地位被认为高于前任领导人江泽民和胡锦涛。
description.en: The establishment of this thought as a guiding ideology of the CPC named after a leader signifies the establishment of Xi Jinping's absolute authority in ideology, with his status considered higher than his predecessors Jiang Zemin and Hu Jintao.

relationships.source: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想
relationships.target: 中华民族伟大复兴

description.zh-cn: 该思想被官方定义为全党全国人民为实现中华民族伟大复兴而奋斗的“行动指南”。
description.en: This thought is officially defined as the "action guide" for the entire party and the people of the whole country to strive for the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.

relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 时任中共北京市委书记蔡奇在公开场合开始使用“习近平总书记重要思想”的提法，推动了该思想的形成和确立。
description.en: Cai Qi, then Secretary of the Beijing Municipal Committee of the CPC, began using the term "General Secretary Xi Jinping's Important Thought" in public, promoting the formation and establishment of the ideology.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会
relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想研究中心（院）

description.zh-cn: 中共中央批准在中共中央党校、教育部、中国社会科学院、中国人民解放军国防大学、北京市、上海市、广东省、北京大学、清华大学、中国人民大学等10家单位成立研究中心（院）。
description.en: The CPC Central Committee approved the establishment of research centers (institutes) at 10 institutions, including the Party School of the Central Committee, the Ministry of Education, the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences, the PLA National Defence University, Beijing, Shanghai, Guangdong, Peking University, Tsinghua University, and Renmin University of China.

relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想学习纲要

description.zh-cn: 组织编写了《习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想学习纲要》一书并推动其发行。
description.en: Organized the writing of the book "Outline for the Study of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era" and promoted its publication.

relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 印发《习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想进课程教材指南》，要求把该思想融入课程教材。
description.en: Issued the "Guidelines for Integrating Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era into Curriculum and Textbooks," requiring the integration of this thought into educational materials.

relationships.target: 学习贯彻习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想主题教育

description.zh-cn: 决定从2023年4月开始，在中共全党开展学习贯彻习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想主题教育。
description.en: Decided to launch a themed education campaign on studying and implementing Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era throughout the entire CPC starting from April 2023.

relationships.target: 习近平著作选读

description.zh-cn: 提出要把学习《习近平著作选读》作为重大政治任务，推动习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想“入脑入心入魂”。
description.en: Stated that studying the "Selected Works of Xi Jinping" should be a major political task to promote Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era to "enter the brain, enter the heart, and enter the soul."

relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 宣布自2024年9月起，香港初中公民与社会发展科将教授习近平思想。
description.en: Announced that from September 2024, Hong Kong's junior secondary subject of Citizenship and Social Development will teach Xi Jinping Thought.

relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 在《学习时报》上撰文，高度评价习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想，称其为“一本读不完的大书”、“一座取不尽的富矿”。
description.en: Wrote an article in the "Study Times" highly praising Xi Jinping Thought, calling it "a great book that can never be finished" and "an inexhaustible rich mine."

relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 评价认为习近平思想缺乏理论创新，其主要目的是树立个人绝对政治权威并为长期执政铺垫。
description.en: Commented that Xi Jinping Thought lacks theoretical innovation and its main purpose is to establish absolute personal political authority and pave the way for long-term rule.

relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 认为习近平思想与毛泽东思想和邓小平理论相比，新的原创内容不多。
description.en: Believes that compared to Mao Zedong Thought and Deng Xiaoping Theory, Xi Jinping Thought does not contain much new original content.

relationships.target: 香港中文大学
上海政法学院

position.zh-cn: 国际事务与公共管理学院副教授
position.en: Associate Professor, School of International Affairs and Public Administration

relationships.source: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想
relationships.target: 习近平法治思想

description.zh-cn: 习近平法治思想是习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的组成部分，是其在法治领域的具体化。
description.en: Xi Jinping Thought on the Rule of Law is a component of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, representing its specification in the field of the rule of law.

relationships.source: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想
relationships.target: 习近平外交思想

description.zh-cn: 习近平外交思想是习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的组成部分，是其在外交领域的具体化。
description.en: Xi Jinping Thought on Diplomacy is a component of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, representing its specification in the field of diplomacy.

relationships.source: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想
relationships.target: 习近平强军思想

description.zh-cn: 习近平强军思想是习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的组成部分，是其在军事领域的具体化。
description.en: Xi Jinping Thought on Strengthening the Military is a component of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, representing its specification in the military field.

relationships.source: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想
relationships.target: 习近平经济思想

description.zh-cn: 习近平经济思想是习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的组成部分，是其在经济领域的具体化。
description.en: Xi Jinping Thought on Economy is a component of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, representing its specification in the economic field.

relationships.source: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想
relationships.target: 习近平生态文明思想

description.zh-cn: 习近平生态文明思想是习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的组成部分，是其在生态文明领域的具体化。
description.en: Xi Jinping Thought on Ecological Civilization is a component of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, representing its specification in the field of ecological civilization.

relationships.source: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想
relationships.target: 习近平文化思想

description.zh-cn: 习近平文化思想是习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的组成部分，是其在文化领域的具体化。
description.en: Xi Jinping Thought on Culture is a component of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, representing its specification in the cultural field.
